infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: MathScan AI accesses your photo library to let you select existing photos of math problems, equations, worksheets, or textbook pages for analysis. For example, you can choose a saved screenshot of a math question to have it solved step-by-step.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires camera access to capture photos of handwritten or printed math problems, equations, and worksheets. For example, you can photograph a math equation from your homework and the app will analyze it, solve it, and provide step-by-step explanations.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: MathScan AI uses your microphone to enable voice input when describing math problems. For example, you can speak a math question aloud instead of typing it.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: MathScan AI saves solved math problems and step-by-step solutions to your photo library. For example, you can save a solution image to review later or share with classmates.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.

plugins.cameraPermission: This app requires camera access to capture photos of handwritten or printed math problems, equations, and worksheets. For example, you can photograph a math equation from your homework and the app will analyze it, solve it, and provide step-by-step explanations.
